message: Let's start with a reasonable offer. I take 60 and you take 40.
Your offer was a bit too much in your favor.  This is more balanced, and we both lose out if this drags on.
The value is going down quickly, Bob. Let's end this. I'll take a slightly smaller share this time.
Okay, Alice, let's be realistic. This offer is the same as your first one, but the value has dropped significantly. We need to settle this now.
